title: "AWS DeepRacer trains and engages tens of thousands of people on machine learning"
excerpt: "Ever since the launch of Amazon Web Services Inc.’s DeepRacer in 2018, tens of thousands of developers from around the world have been getting hands-on experience with reinforcement learning in the AWS Management Console by building their AWS DeepRacer models and competing in the AWS DeepRacer League for a chance to be crowned the AWS DeepRacer League Champion at Amazon’s yearly re:Invent conference."
